execution_plan.description: Compute the order status value(s) that have the smallest number of orders (i.e., the most uncommon order status). Returns each status and its count; includes all statuses tied for the minimum count.
execution_plan.query: SELECT t.order_status_code, t.cnt FROM (SELECT order_status_code, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM Orders GROUP BY order_status_code) t JOIN (SELECT MIN(cnt) AS min_cnt FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM Orders GROUP BY order_status_code) x) m ON t.cnt = m.min_cnt;
